--dx-scheme.help: Label of the diagnostic coding scheme used in predictive models. tag. Accepted values: {dx_scheme_labels}.

--dx-outcome.help: Label of the outcome/target to be predicted by predictive models. tag. Accepted values: {dx_outcome_labels}.

--pr-scheme.help: Label of the procedure coding scheme used in predictive models. tag. Accepted values: {pr_scheme_labels}.

--emb.help: Embedding method to use. Accepted values: {emb_labels}.

--mlflow-store.help: Storage URL for mlflow records, e.g. for PostgresQL database.

--optuna-store.help: Storage URL for optuna records, e.g. for PostgresQL database.

--output-dir.help: Aboslute path to log intermediate results.

--training-time-limit.help: Number of maximum hours for training in single trial.

--trials-time-limit.help: Number of maximum hours for all trials.
